LanguageData.Magazine_20mm_HighExplosive.label: 20mm HE magazine
LanguageData.Magazine_20mm_HighExplosive.description: A magazine of 20mm shells filled with high explosives.containing enough ammo to burst fire several times. Explodes when damaged.
LanguageData.Bullet_20mm_HighExplosive.label: HE 20mm round
LanguageData.Magazine_20mm_ArmorPiercing.label: 20mm AP magazine
LanguageData.Magazine_20mm_ArmorPiercing.description: A magazine of 20mm steel shells.containing enough ammo to burst fire several times. Explodes when damaged.
LanguageData.Bullet_20mm_ArmorPiercing.label: AP 20mm round
